isis.stitle: VT-365 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (2002) - DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS AND ACCESSORIES - Using Master Diagnostics (MD 32) - Check And Clear Diagnostic Trouble Codes (DTCs)

svcproc.title: Check And Clear Diagnostic Trouble Codes (DTCs)

step1.para: Select Code on the menu bar, then the View option.

svcproc.para: If the ECM has detected any DTCs, they will be displayed automatically. DTCs detected on the current (ignition) Key-ON cycle will be displayed as active. Only DTCs detected on previous key cycles will be displayed as inactive. An up/down scroll bar will automatically appear whenever there are too many codes to be displayed in the window. Slide the scroll bar up or down to view any remaining codes.

step1.para: To learn more about a DTC, double click on any of the parameters listed in the ATA Code column of the DTC window. This will launch Help and display further details associated with a specific DTC. See the topic EST Help.
To clear codes, select Code then Clear from the drop-down menu bar.
